output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
data1<-data.frame(day=c("Mon","Tues","Wed","Thur","Fri") ,value=c(3,12,5,18,45))
ggplot(data=data1, mapping=aes(x=day, y=value)) + geom_bar(stat = "identity")

```
```{r}
data("ToothGrowth")
attach(ToothGrowth)
ggplot(ToothGrowth, aes(y=len)) + geom_boxplot()

ggplot(ToothGrowth, aes(y=len)) + 
geom_boxplot(color = "blue", fill="yellow") +
labs(title = "Boxplot for Length", y="Tooth Length")
str(ToothGrowth)
ggplot(ToothGrowth, aes(y=len, x=supp, fill=supp)) + 
geom_boxplot()

```
